alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Carroll; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 4:23PM EDT until September 08 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN STRAFFORD...SOUTHEASTERN BELKNAP AND SOUTHEASTERN CARROLL COUNTIES... At 423 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Alton to near Wolfeboro, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ossipee, Farmington, Alton, Barnstead, Gilmanton, Effingham, Wolfeboro, Belmont, Acton, Brookfield, Wakefield, New Durham, Middleton, Milton, and Newfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
